name: Chile Cheese Triangle Toasts
author: COOKINCOWGIRLS
summary: I invented this yummy, easy appetizer for a big party we were catering. Many asked for the recipe.
ingredients: ¼ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
6 slices potato bread, crusts removed and bread cut into 4 triangles
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix mayonnaise, Mexican cheese blend, butter, jalapeno peppers, and hot sauce together in a bowl; spread onto each bread triangle
Place triangles on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until toasts are lightly browned, about 5 minutes
